bill.title: The Uniform Faithful Presidential Electors Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The "uniform Faithful Presidential Electors Act"; To Provide That Each Political Party Or Unaffiliated Presidential Candidate Shall Submit To The Secretary Of State The Names Of Two Qualified Individuals For Each Elector Position In This State; To Provide That One Of The Individuals Must Be Designated As The Elector Nominee And The Other Must Be Designated As The Alternate Elector Nominee; To Require Each Elector Nominated By A Political Party Under Or By An Unaffiliated Presidential Candidate Shall Execute A Pledge; To Require The Secretary Of State To Preside At The Meeting Of The Electors; To Provide That The Secretary Of State Shall Prepare A Certificate Of Vote; To Provide That The Electors On The Final List Shall Sign The Certificate; To Repeal Sections 23-15-1081 And 23-15-1085, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For Mississippi's Presidential Primaries And Delegate Selection; And For Related Purposes.
